modName: Faceless Black Hood RE PLACER for Nightingale Hood
summary: Replaces the Nightingale Hood with the faceless black Monk Hood
descriptionHtml:
I was fooling around with the Nightingale armour when I had this happen.  I made a quick search and I don\'t think any others exist yet so I thought I would share. 

item code 005DB88
Hit the ~ key to bring up console and enter
player.additem 005DB88 1

Install like any other mod.
Simply extract the Data folder in the Skyrim folder.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
or
C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
author: MikeFightNight

files.name: FEMALE Nightingale Hood to Faceless Black Hood
